mapper.select: select p.packageNum, p.sellerNum, p.packageName, s.sellerNum, s.storeName, po.userNum, po.pkTotalPrice, po.pkOrderNum ,po.orderedAt, po.deleveryStatus from packageOrder po Join package p on po.packageNum = p.packageNum Join sellerdetail s on p.sellerNum = s.sellerNum where po.userNum = #{userNum} order by po.orderedAt desc

SELECT ps.subnum, ps.usernum, CONCAT( LEFT(u.userId, 1), REPEAT('*', CHAR_LENGTH(u.userId) - 2), RIGHT(u.userId, 1) ) as userId, u.username, u.phone, ps.packagenum, p.packagename, p.catenum, p.startdate, p.enddate, ps.sellernum, ps.substartdate, ps.subenddate, ps.subround FROM pakagesubscribe ps LEFT JOIN user u ON ps.usernum = u.usernum JOIN package p ON ps.packagenum = p.packagenum WHERE ps.sellernum = #{sellernum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO packageorder (packageNum, userNum, subNum, pkTotalPrice, deleveryStatus) VALUES (#{packageNum}, #{userNum}, #{subNum}, #{pkTotalPrice}, #{deleveryStatus})
